comments.body:

comments.author: adamdriscoll
comments.body: Ah ok. I can look around for the CORECLR API. I was just messing around with this and as you said it's really just for debugging.

comments.body: I fixed my one comment above and merged your change with commit 28f32ca

title: Adding support for ENABLE_BINDER_DEBUG_LOGGING in CORECLR
